desc: Traditionally made with wild boar, most often pork or chicken is used nowadays. This curry contains a variety of herbs, but does not contain coconut milk.
keyword: wild boar, pork, chicken, curry, northern
name_thai: แกงป่า

desc: This creamy curry has as its main ingredient the leaves and flower buds of the Senna siamea tree (khilek in Thai).
keyword: creamy, curry, leaves, flower buds, senna siamea tree
name_thai: แกงขี้เหล็ก

desc: Red curry with roast duck is the quintessential mix of the Thai (red curry) and Chinese (red roast duck) cuisines. This dish often also contains grapes and/or pineapple.
keyword: red curry, roast duck, grapes, pineapple
name_thai: แกงเผ็ดเป็ดย่าง

desc: Central Thai curry made with morning glory (also known as "water spinach") and usually containing with pork belly.
keyword: central, curry, belly pork, chinese water spinach
name_thai: แกงเทโพ

desc: Yellow curry of Indian origin and is often made with chicken and potatoes. It can also be made with other meats or seafood.
keyword: thai-muslim, yellow curry,indian origin,chicken,potatoes

desc: It is a slowly stewed meat curry from northern Thailand, often made with beef.
keyword: slowly stewed, curry, northern
name_thai: จิ๊นฮุ่ม

desc: A very spicy, dry fried curry made with chopped meat (usually beef, chicken, pork or lamb) served with a large amount of shredded fresh kaffir lime leaves.
keyword: very spicy, dry fried, curry, shredded fresh kaffir lime leaves
name_thai: คั่วกลิ้ง

desc: A very spicy and, for Thai standards, "dry" curry with pork ribs. It is a Southern Thai speciality.
keyword: very spicy, dry, curry, pork ribs, southern
name_thai: คั่วกระดูกหมู

desc: Central Thai curry which uses a large amount of turmeric in the paste. A popular preparation is with prawns and pineapple.
keyword: turmeric,prawns,pineapple,straw mushrooms
name_thai: แกงคั่ว

desc: A thick, spicy vegetable curry made with turmeric, a sauce made from fish innards (tai pla), and shrimp paste, containing roasted fish, bamboo shoots and eggplant.

name_thai: แกงไตปลา

desc: A thick, Indian style curry containing coconut milk, usually of stewed beef or chicken. This curry contains roasted dried spices that are rarely found in other Thai curries.

desc: A thick central Thai curry with pork and bai chamuang, the leaves of the Garcinia cowa, a tree related to the mangosteen.

desc: A spicy northern "curry" with meat and several kinds of vegetables, and without any coconut milk.

desc: A somewhat spicy soup/curry made with cabbage and pork ribs. As is usual with Northern Thai "curries", it does not contain any coconut milk.

desc: A so-called dry, Indian influenced coconut curry with beef, chicken, pork or seafood such as soft shell crab.

desc: A pork curry aspic (jelly) from northern Thailand which is eaten cold.

name_thai: ข้าวผัดไข่

desc: A version of the Thai sour and spicy soup with mushrooms as the main ingredient.
keyword: vegetarian, spicy, sour, soup, mushrooms
name_thai: ต้มยำเห็ด

desc: A version of the sour and spicy coconut milk soup with mushrooms as the main ingredient.
keyword: vegetarian, spicy, sour, soup, mushrooms, coconut milk
name_thai: ต้มข่าเห็ด

desc: Meatless version of Pad Thai stir-fried rice noodles, usually served with bean sprouts and crushed peanuts, and may contain egg and tofu.
keyword: vegetarian, meatless, pad thai, stir-fried, noodles, bean sprouts, crushed peanuts, egg, tofu
name_thai: ผัดไทยมังสวิรัติ

desc: Meatless version of stir-fried wide rice noodles in soy sauce. It usually contains Chinese kale, and may contain egg and other vegetables.
keyword: vegetarian, meatless, stir-fried, rice noodles, soy sauce, chinese kale, egg
name_eng: Vegetarian Fried Noodles with Soy Sauce
name_thai: ผัดซีอิ๊วมังสวิรัติ

desc: Meatless version of spicy stir-fried rice noodles.
keyword: vegetarian, meatless, spicy, stir-fried, noodles
name_thai: ก๋วยเตี๋ยวผัดขี้เมามังสวิรัติ

desc: Meatless version of Yen Tafo rice noodles in a tangy red colored broth.
keyword: vegetarian, meatless, rice noodles, broth, yen tafo
name_thai: เย็นตาโฟมังสวิรัติ

desc: Meatless version of  mixed vegetables stir-fried in a red curry paste.
keyword: vegetarian, meatless, mixed, vegetables, stir-fried, curry paste
name_eng: Stir-fried Red Curry with Mixed Vegetables
name_thai: ผัดพริแกงผักรวมมังสวิรัติ
name_thai_eng: Phat Phrik Kaeng Phak Ruam Mang-sawirat

desc: Meatless version of green curry with a base of coconut milk, usually containing Thai eggplant.
keyword: vegetarian, meatless, green cury, coconut milk, thai eggplant
name_thai: แกงเขียวหวานมังสวิรัติ

desc: Meatless version of yellow curry.
keyword: vegetarian, meatless, yellow, curry
name_thai: แกงกะหรี่มังสวิรัติ

desc: Meatless version of sweet and spicy coconut milk curry containing pieces of tofu.
keyword: vegetarian, meatless, sweet, spicy, coconut milk, curry, tofu, panang
name_thai: แกงพะแนงเต้าหู้
